title: Pirates of the Caribbean
date: Every day, from August 11-17, 11 am-8 pm
description:
Set sail on a flavor adventure with this juicy, 1/3lb all-beef patty topped with melty American cheese, crowned with Caribbean slaw and rum-caramelized onions. It's a tantalizing blend of smoky sweetness and tropical flair. Mesquite-smoked jalape√±o aioli and crispy jalape√±o straws add a crunchy (not too) spicy crescendo. Fire-roasted green chili drizzle and house sauce bring a richness to satisfy your craving for a taste of the islands. A burger that dares to be different & promises a voyage of bold, adventurous flavors, this pirate's treasure is waiting for you!
#WeDon'tRunOut 
Available vegetarian with Impossible Burger. Available vegan with Impossible Burger, no cheese, sauce substitution. Gluten free is a bed of lettuce and no crispy-fried jalape√±os.
hours: Every day, from August 11-17, 11 am-8 pm
